el:protected.el:luamain:
rooms_wide=14 rooms_high=1
levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide) levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
create_world( levelw, levelh)
fill_floor("fl-metal", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c =="B" then set_stone( "st-actorimpulse", i-1, line) elseif c =="K" then set_stone( "st-stoneimpulse", i-1, line) elseif c =="t" then set_stone( "st-rock6",i-1,line) elseif c =="M" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) set_item("it-wormhole", i-1, line, {strength=1,targetx="259.5",targety="6.5"}) elseif c =="N" then set_item("it-wormhole", i-1, line, {strength=1,targetx="8.5",targety="3.5"}) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "!" then abyss(i-1,line) elseif c=="+" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c=="g" then draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1) elseif c=="l" then oneway(i-1,line, enigma.WEST) elseif c=="u" then oneway(i-1,line, enigma.NORTH) elseif c=="r" then oneway(i-1,line, enigma.EAST) elseif c=="d" then oneway(i-1,line, enigma.SOUTH) elseif c=="c" then set_item("it-coin1", i-1,line) elseif c=="z" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i-0.5,line+0.5, {player=0}) elseif c=="g" then draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1) elseif c=="S" then set_item("it-seed", i-1, line) elseif c == "7" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0110) elseif c == "9" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0011) elseif c == "3" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1001) elseif c == "1" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1100) elseif c == "h" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0101) elseif c == "v" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1010) elseif c == "8" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1000) elseif c == "6" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0100) elseif c == "2" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0010) elseif c == "4" then puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0001) elseif c=="s" then fill_floor("fl-space", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c=="L" then fill_floor("fl-leaves", i-1,line, 37,11) elseif c=="R" then fill_floor("fl-rough", i-1,line, 18,11) elseif c=="Y" then fill_floor("fl-abyss", i-1,line, 94,4) elseif c=="Q" then fill_floor("fl-abyss", i-1,line, 92,4) elseif c=="i" then fill_floor("fl-ice", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c=="P" then set_item("it-brush",i-1,line) elseif c=="e" then set_item("it-extralife",i-1,line) elseif c=="F" then set_stone("st-switch", i-1,line, {action="callback",target="funcc2"}) elseif c=="x" then draw_stones("st-stonebrush", {i-1,line}, {1,0},1) elseif c=="A" then set_stone("st-coinslot", i-1,line, {action="openclose", target="door1"}) elseif c=="a" then doorv( i-1,line, {name="door1"}) elseif c=="X" then set_stone("st-switch", i-1,line, {action="callback",target="funcc1"}) end end end
-- Floor: " " -- Border: "#" -- Oxyd: "o"
renderLine(00,"####################Y ####################Y #######################################") renderLine(01,"#R x x # #isisisisisisis#sis# #L #o#o#o#o#o#o#o#o#A #") renderLine(02,"# xx x xxx x x xxx+# #s##isisisisisi#i#i# # #u#u#u#u#u#u#u#u# #") renderLine(03,"# x x x x # #is#sisisBsisis#s#s# # #u#u#u#u#u#u#u#u# #") renderLine(04,"# x xx xxx x x xx x#tttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt##i#isisisisisi#i#i#tttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt# ##### SSSS #") renderLine(05,"# x x x x x x l l s#sisisisisisis# l l # # SSSS #") renderLine(06,"# xxx x x xx xxx xx#tttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt####################tttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt# z # N a c SSSS #") renderLine(07,"# xMx+x x xPx r r # 2 2 #!r r # # SSSS #") renderLine(08,"#xx x x xxxxxx xxx #tttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt# # #7h4v 14 !# ttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt# ##### SSSS #") renderLine(09,"# x x x #Y #e#6h3 7hh4 !# tQ # #d#d#d#d#d#d#d#d# #") renderLine(10,"# xxxx xxx xxxxxx# #e# 8 8 2 # t # #d#d#d#d#d#d#d#d# #") renderLine(11,"# x # #F# # 8 #Xt # #o#o#o#o#o#o#o#o#A #") renderLine(12,"#################### ####################tt #######################################")
oxyd_shuffle()
through=0 function funcc1() if through==0 then --set_stone( "st-brownie",12 , 2) set_stone( "st-brownie",18 , 2) --set_stone( "st-brownie",3, 6) set_stone( "st-brownie",7 , 7) --set_stone( "st-brownie",4, 9) set_stone( "st-brownie",5, 7) through=1 end end
through2=0 function funcc2() if through2==0 then set_stone( "st-greenbrown",124 ,5) set_stone( "st-greenbrown",125 ,5) set_stone( "st-greenbrown",126 ,5) set_stone( "st-greenbrown",127 ,5) set_stone( "st-grate1",125 ,6) set_stone( "st-grate1",126 ,6) fill_floor("fl-metal", 124,6,4,2) through2=1 end end
